name: a11y-navbar
description: A script which creates a navigation menu complying with the WAI-ARIA Menubar pattern.

scripts.build: $(npm bin)/babel src --out-file dist/a11yNavbar.min.js --presets=@babel/preset-env && cp node_modules/hoverintent/dist/hoverintent.min.js dist && cp node_modules/@babel/polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js dist

author: Joe Bondra
